name: Synthetic Biology for carbon negative manufacturing of chemicals and materials
gpt_description: In this video, the speaker discusses the urgent need to reimagine and rebuild our carbon economy in light of the recent IPCC report on climate change. They introduce Lancetec, a company that uses a natural organism to transform waste carbon into various products, including ethanol, jet fuel, and even clothing. The speaker explains how the process works and showcases some of the products Lancetec has already made, including a tennis jacket for Adidas. They emphasize the importance of recycling and reducing carbon emissions to combat climate change.
